solution_line_template: Every day, Jaylen's dog eats {cups_per_meal} x {meals_per_day} = <<{cups_per_meal}*{meals_per_day}={cups_per_day}>>{cups_per_day} cups of dog food.
The bag will feed her dog for {total_cups_in_bag} / {cups_per_day} = <<{total_cups_in_bag}/{cups_per_day}={number_of_days}>>{number_of_days} days.
